meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #861.

td.p: Jim Gaylord, a tax consultant from Laguna Niguel, California
Louise Reyburn Dice, a farmer & writer from Taos, New Mexico
Tom Wickham, an airline pilot from Torrington, Connecticut

tr.td: AMERICAN POETRY
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
TREES
NAMESAKES
THE OCCULT
FOLK MUSIC
